mapper.sql: room_id, name, district_id, ownerarea, housearea, builddate, cp, floor, housestyle, housestyle_type, buildarea, houseprice, gn, cqnx, dt, housedirection, finish_type, onSale_type, market_type, tenement_type,market_time
mapper.select:
select A.*,B.file_url from room_details A left join room_file B on A.room_id=B.room_details_id
and A.district_id=#{districtid}
and (A.name like '%${roomName}%' or A.ownerarea like '%${ownerarea}%')
group by A.room_id
mapper.insert: insert into room_details (room_id, name, district_id, ownerarea, housearea, builddate, cp, floor, housestyle, housestyle_type, buildarea, houseprice, gn, cqnx, dt, housedirection, finish_type, onSale_type, market_type, tenement_type) values (#{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ownerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housearea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{builddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{housestyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housestyleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{buildarea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{houseprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gn,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cqnx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dt,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{housedirection,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{finishType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{onsaleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{marketType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tenementType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update room_details
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ownerarea = #{ownerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
housearea = #{housearea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
builddate = #{builddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cp = #{cp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
housestyle = #{housestyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
housestyle_type = #{housestyleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
buildarea = #{buildarea,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
houseprice = #{houseprice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gn = #{gn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cqnx = #{cqnx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dt = #{dt,jdbcType=TINYINT},
housedirection = #{housedirection,jdbcType=TINYINT},
finish_type = #{finishType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
onSale_type = #{onsaleType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
market_type = #{marketType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
tenement_type = #{tenementType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
market_time= #{marketTime,jdbcType=DATE},
brokerId= #{brokerId,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update room_details set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ownerarea = #{ownerarea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, housearea = #{housearea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, builddate = #{builddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cp = #{cp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, floor = #{floor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, housestyle = #{housestyle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, housestyle_type = #{housestyleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, buildarea = #{buildarea,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, houseprice = #{houseprice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gn = #{gn,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cqnx = #{cqnx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dt = #{dt,jdbcType=TINYINT}, housedirection = #{housedirection,jdbcType=TINYINT}, finish_type = #{finishType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, onSale_type = #{onsaleType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, market_type = #{marketType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, tenement_type = #{tenementType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
